mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.goods_id AS "goods.id", g.goods_no AS "goods.goodsNo", g.goods_name AS "goods.goodsName", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_pic_url AS "goodsPicUrl", a.length AS "length", a.high AS "high", a.multiple AS "multiple", a.num AS "num", a.qty AS "qty", a.price AS "price", a.amount AS "amount", a.param1 AS "param1", a.param2 AS "param2", a.param3 AS "param3", a.param4 AS "param4", a.param5 AS "param5", a.is_finalize AS "isFinalize", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.eval_flag AS "evalFlag", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId"
left join goods g ON g.id = a.goods_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_dtl( order_id, goods_id, goods_name, goods_pic_url, length, high, multiple, num, qty, price, amount, param1, param2, param3, param4, param5, is_finalize, remarks, eval_flag, merchant_id ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{goods.id}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPicUrl}, #{length}, #{high}, #{multiple}, #{num}, #{qty}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{isFinalize}, #{remarks}, #{evalFlag}, #{merchantId}goods.id )

INSERT INTO order_dtl
order_id,
goods_id,
goods_name,
goods_pic_url,
length,
high,
multiple,
num,
qty,
price,
amount,
param1,
param2,
param3,
param4,
param5,
is_finalize,
remarks,
eval_flag,
merchant_id,

mapper.update: UPDATE order_dtl SET order_id = #{orderId}, goods_id = #{goods.id}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_pic_url = #{goodsPicUrl}, length = #{length}, high = #{high}, multiple = #{multiple}, num = #{num}, qty = #{qty}, price = #{price}, amount = #{amount}, param1 = #{param1}, param2 = #{param2}, param3 = #{param3}, param4 = #{param4}, param5 = #{param5}, is_finalize = #{isFinalize}, remarks = #{remarks}, eval_flag = #{evalFlag}, merchant_id = #{merchantId} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE order_dtl
order_id = #{orderId},
goods_id = #{goods.id},
goods_name = #{goodsName},
goods_pic_url = #{goodsPicUrl},
length = #{length},
high = #{high},
multiple = #{multiple},
num = #{num},
qty = #{qty},
price = #{price},
amount = #{amount},
param1 = #{param1},
param2 = #{param2},
param3 = #{param3},
param4 = #{param4},
param5 = #{param5},
is_finalize = #{isFinalize},
remarks = #{remarks},
eval_flag = #{evalFlag},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
WHERE id = #{id}
